200.description: Returns API info as a JSON
Returns a map of UTC offset to timezone
Returns an audio file for the word "achievibit"

get.description: Clears the `kibibit-jwt` cookie. This effectively logs out the user. **Note that the JWT token is still valid until it expires.**

200.description: The user has been logged out successfully.

401.description: If the user is not authenticated, it cannot log out.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all users

200.description: A paginated list of type User

get.description: Redirects to Github OAuth flow for authentication
Github OAuth callback URL. This is the URL that Github will redirect to after authentication
Returns the current user. Requires a valid JWT token
Clears the JWT cookie, and invalidates the JWT token

200.description: The user has been logged out successfully.

401.description: If the user is not authenticated, it cannot log out.

get.description: Returns the current user settings. Requires a valid JWT token

patch.description: Updates the current user settings. Requires a valid JWT token

get.description: Will return the currently integrated cloud git systems
Will return the currently integrated cloud git system with related repositories

parameters.name: system
parameters.description: The cloud git system to get the available repositories for

get.description: Will return the available repositories for all cloud git systems
Will return the available repositories for the given cloud git system
Will return the currently installed GitHub Apps

delete.description: Will uninstall a webhook on the given repository

get.description: Will post install the GitHub App

Returns a paginated list of all pull requests

info.title: achievibit-api
info.description:
![swagger-mode](https://img.shields.io/badge/mode-devcontainer-FF5BF8)

Since this swagger shares the same domain as the app, you can use the same cookie for authentication.

For the WebSocket API, please visit [achievibit-ws](/api/docs-async)

bearer.description: JWT token for authenticated user routes

cookie.name: user_token
cookie.description: JWT token for authenticated user routes

gitlab-webhook.name: x-gitlab-token
gitlab-webhook.description: Secret token for GitLab webhooks validation (usually sent by GitLab)

github-webhook.name: x-hub-signature-256
github-webhook.description: Secret token for GitHub webhooks validation (usually sent by GitHub)

bitbucket-webhook.name: x-hub-signature
bitbucket-webhook.description: Secret token for Bitbucket webhooks validation (usually sent by Bitbucket)
